item.title: Weekly Notes 1
item.description: Open Source Work Made my first open source contribution to hugo-coder the theme that this website is built on. The PR though just a doc link fix, got reviewed and merged. Personal I’ve commited to writting a weekly-review of stuff I do over each week, and which i find interesting enough to write about. Got hired for a technical writting gig :). Missed an interview. :( Interesting stuff this week John Carmack commencement speech: Knowledge in depth.
